sentence.Network_en: It was named after Amerigo Vespucci, who landed in America in the late fifteenth century.
sentence.Network_cn: 它是以在十五世纪末登陆美洲的亚美利哥?维斯浦奇的名字命名的.

sentence.Network_en: Amerigo Vespucci allegedly leaves C á diz for his first voyage to the New World.
sentence.Network_cn: 1497年的今天,阿美利哥·维斯普西声称他离开卡迪兹航海前往“新世界”.
